text: "The Chinese #vaccine opened up my new life and kept me away from disease," Leocadia, 67, said. Recently, #China's #Sinovac #COVID19 vaccine came to Acaxochitlán, the state of #Hidalgo in #Mexico where she lives, and she became one of the first batch to receive the first jab. https://t.co/WamdR2DIyJ
